headline.print_headline: How to Bridge Chicago’s Divide: Mayor Obama?
headline.main: How to Bridge Chicago’s Divide: Mayor Obama?

snippet: Readers discuss how Chicago is no longer “the city that works.” A former resident (now president) or his wife could change that, one reader says.
lead_paragraph: Readers discuss how Chicago is no longer “the city that works.” A former resident (now president) or his wife could change that, one reader says.
